install.name: Content - Load Coord
install.author: Noxidsoft
install.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later
install.description: This content plugin adds several ways to link a Google map view to map coordinates within content. Don't forget to publish this plugin. Usage: {loadmap latitude, longitude}

param.name: mapMode
param.label: Map mode
param.description: Choose the link map mode, that is, will the map open in a new or the parent window.

param.name: mapZoom
param.label: Map zoom
param.description: A number that represents the zoom of map closeness.
